subject: Deaths (Fatalities)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Wally Bell, who worked the National League division series between the Pittsburgh Pirates and the St. Louis Cardinals that ended last week, has died, apparently of a heart attack, at 48.
snippet: Wally Bell, who worked the National League division series between the Pittsburgh Pirates and the St. Louis Cardinals that ended last week, has died, apparently of a heart attack, at 48.
